thoughts.text: I have generated an image of the top language learning resources and travel destinations. I'll use the 'browse_website' command to find more information on the top destinations.
thoughts.reasoning: Browsing the websites will allow me to gather more detailed information on the top destinations and make a more informed decision.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the 'get_text_summary' command to get a summary of the information on each website
- Read through the summaries and gather the most important information
- Use the information to decide on a language to start learning and a destination to visit
- Use the 'generate_image' command to generate an image of the top language learning resources and travel destinations
- Use the 'browse_website' command to find more information on the top destinations
thoughts.criticism: I need to make sure I am not relying too heavily on the summaries and missing important details. I should still take the time to read through the websites in more detail if necessary.
thoughts.speak: I have generated an image of the top language learning resources and travel destinations. I'll use the 'browse_website' command to find more information on the top destinations.

args.question: What are the top attractions and activities to do in Africa?
